extension.name: Powerful Slide Flash for joomla 3.0
extension.author: Smallirons.net
extension.description:
The Powerful Slide Flash

The PSF module arranges all the images and thumbnails from folder in a gallery.

Features:
  1. Allow show images via two options:
    a) inside the object module with enlarge option
    b) full screen view with full enlarge option....


Requirements:
  1. Joomla! 3.0.x site.

field.name: bannerWidth
field.label: Flash object width (px or %)
field.description: Flash Montage object width in px

field.name: imgsrc
field.label: Image Source
field.description: List of images sources, separated by |

field.name: imgdir
field.label: Directory for Images
field.description: Directory for images, the images contained in this direcory MUST have the same name (as in Image source) of the corrisponding thumbnail images

field.name: thumbdir
field.label: Directory for thumbnails
field.description: Directory for images, the thumbnail images contained in this direcory MUST have the same name (as in Image source) of the corrisponding images. Example : If the image indicated in image source is 004.jpg you must insert a 004.jpg (full size)in image directory and a 004.jpg (small size) in thumbnails directory

field.name: imgdsc
field.default: Autumn is here...|Color of Paris|Description three|Description four|Description five|Description six
field.label: Image description
field.description: List of image descriptions delimited by |

field.name: horizspace
field.label: horizontal space thumb (px)
field.description: horizontal space between thumbs in pixel

field.name: vertispace
field.label: vertical space thumb (px)
field.description: vertical space between thumbs in pixel

field.name: background
field.label: background color
field.description: html code for background color, if not indicated default value assumed

field.name: thumb_ou_normalcolor
field.label: thumb outline normal color
field.description: html code for thumb outline normal color, if not indicated default value assumed

field.name: thumb_ou_selectedcolor
field.label: thumb outline selected color
field.description: html code for thumb outline selected color, if not indicated default value assumed

field.name: thumb_back_color
field.label: thumb background color
field.description: html code for thumb background color, if not indicated default value assumed

field.name: buttons_back_color
field.label: buttons background color
field.description: html code for buttons background color, if not indicated default value assumed

field.name: maximage
field.label: Allow maximize image
field.description: Allow maximize image , enlarge (+) pointer on.
